last_episode_to_air.name: The Eternal Haunting
last_episode_to_air.overview: The people who run a civil war museum in Kentucky say it's so dangerous, they're thinking of shutting the place down. They're praying Steve and Cindy can save this important piece of American history.

name: The Dead Files
overview: Psychic medium Amy Allan and former NYPD homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi investigate locations that are reported to be haunted.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two premieres with an astonishing examination of the Lizzie Borden House in Massachusetts. Highlights from the season include a historic home in Cartersville, Georgia, where the duo investigates a terrified mother's claims of strange paranormal activity and soon discover aggressive entities and evidence of a shocking murder. In Santaquin, Utah, the team explores disturbing paranormal reports at a family-owned restaurant, along with a residence in Elizabeth City, North Carolina housing a tragic past. Additional sites include the Slocum House Theater in Vancouver, Washington, where increasingly odd unexplained activity and ghostly apparitions have left its staff fearful for their safety, and a family home in Wichita, Kansas that is the center of a bone-chilling paranormal mystery dating back to the cowboy days of the 1800s.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In the third season, retired NYPD Homicide Detective Steve DiSchiavi and medium Amy Allan travels to a variety of locations including Huntington, West Virginia; Joliet, Illinois; Carmel, New York; Rome, Georgia; and Garrett, Indiana.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Season four begins in Egg Harbor City, NJ where one couple's home has turned from a cozy fixer-upper into a living hell. Additional locations include a house in Browns Summit, NC where haunted activity is adversely affecting one family's health; a childhood home in Wabash, IN that has taken on paranormal activity since it was rebuilt after a mysterious fire; the former home to a murderous mobster in Rock Island, IL that's ridden with unexplained shadows and noises; a Watervleit, MI home overcome with aggressive activity that terrorizes its inhabitants; a 19th century mansion in Buchanan, VA with dark secrets; and two haunted hotels - the Occidental Hotel in Buffalo, WY and The Amargosa Hotel & Opera House in Death Valley, CA, both of which are rapidly losing business due to terrified guests.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The fifth season opens with an investigation of Iowa's Villisca Axe Murder House - site of a gruesome century-old mass murder whose case still remains unsolved. Other highlights include a Chicago home where a woman has returned to confront childhood nightmares; violent forces terrorizing a family home in St. Clair Shores, MI, that leaves the team questioning the safety of the house; a special "Dead Files Revisited" episode in which a violent exorcism was recorded in a Flint, MI home after the duo uncovered malicious entities; and more.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: From the Pacific Northwest to the Florida everglades, DiSchiavi and Allan are on a mission to help solve each case and restore peace to their distressed clients - whether it's an entire family living in terror, a besieged business or an unexplained violent attack. In the season six premiere, Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Florida City, Fla. to help a frightened family terrorized by disturbing paranormal activity. Upcoming investigations take place in Abilene, Texas; Chester Springs, Pa; Flint, Mich.; Ft. Barnwell, N.C.; Hanover, Pa.; Leslie, Mich.; Roseburg, Ore.; Santa Paula, Calif; St. Louis, Mo.; Sumpter, Ore.; Toledo, Ohio; and Warsaw, Ind.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: Featured locations in the seventh season includes Montego Bay, Jamaica; Falconer, N.Y.; Independence, Ore.; Macon, Ga.; Oregon, Ill.; Covington, La.; Struthers, Ohio; Delaware, Ohio; Coupland, Texas; Marshall, Mo.; Albuquerque, N.M.; Delmont, Penn.

episodes.name: Evil in Erieville
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve uncover the murderous past hidden within the walls of a rural New York farmhouse. Steve's complex investigation reveals a mother's unspeakable crime, while Amy's harrowing walk-through leads her to a dangerous portal.

episodes.name: The Devil Made Me Do It
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve discover the gruesome secrets of what may be a haunted restaurant in Asbury Park, NJ. Their discoveries shock the restaurant's owner and shed new light on an evil truth hiding in the basement.

episodes.name: Terror in the Shadows
episodes.overview: The Dead Files team investigates claims that terrifying phantoms have tortured a northern California family for generations. Amy takes a horrifying walk through their home, and Steve uncovers accounts of phantoms, possessions and unexplained physical attacks.

episodes.name: Death and Dolls
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate claims that a North Carolina home is filled with dolls that are vessels for the dead. In this episode, Steve uncovers startling discoveries. Amy feels threatened by a man in black, and a 9-year-old girl sees the dead.

episodes.name: The White Widow
episodes.overview: The Dead Files Team investigates an historic home in New Orleans to help a family tortured by unexplained visions and bizarre occurrences. Steve hears chilling eyewitness testimonies, while Amy comes face-to-face with the apparition bearing a shocking secret.

episodes.name: Hotel Hell
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate a historic Central Florida hotel where owners and guests have been tormented by terrifying visions. Steve uncovers the inn's morbid history, and Amy is pushed to the edge of madness.

episodes.name: Am I Crazy?
episodes.overview: The Dead Files Team investigates claims that the spirit of a murdered socialite haunts a historic Montana home. Steve digs up a scandalous past, and Amy is eluded by a spirit who may know the truth behind the horrible secrets buried within this legendary home.

episodes.name: Killed by the Klan
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve uncover a history of unspeakable violent crimes when a Florida couple claims to see spirits in their home. Steve hunts down evidence of voodoo sacrifices and rampant racism, while Amy is horrified by visions of disfigured dead.

episodes.name: Alcatraz - San Francisco
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate disturbing reports of paranormal activity at the legendary Alcatraz Prison in San Francisco, including demonic possessions and eyewitness accounts. The Team uncovers secrets about the bloody history of America's most iconic penitentiary.

episodes.name: Lizzie Borden House
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate new claims of paranormal activity at Lizzie Borden House.

episodes.name: Scandal in the South
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate a terrified mother's claims of strange paranormal activity in Georgia. Amy and Steve embark on a journey to unveil the dark truth lurking within the family's historic residence.

episodes.name: Fear at the Family Tree
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate disturbing reports of paranormal activity at a family-owned restaurant in Santaquin, Utah. A fearful mother is faced with a harsh decision: hand over a potentially haunted business to her daughter, or walk away entirely.

episodes.name: A Watery Grave
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate claims that a North Carolina man is being terrorized.

episodes.name: Final Curtain Call
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate reports of frightening paranormal activity at a community theater in Vancouver, WA. Amy discovers secrets hiding in the dark corners of the Slocum House Theater while Steve unearths the location's bloody history.

episodes.name: Deadly Attraction
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a frightened grandmother's claims of paranormal activity.

episodes.name: Pandora's Box
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate reports of bizarre paranormal activity at a family's home.

episodes.name: Surrounded
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate paranormal sightings at a historic Cedar Park, TX homestead.

episodes.name: Blood and Gold
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate frightening reports at a museum in an old Nevada mining town.

episodes.name: A Widow's Rage
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate reports of dangerous paranormal encounters at an old Southern plantation home in the town of Uriah, Alabama.

episodes.name: Death Sentence
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve investigate Santa Fe's abandoned and infamous New Mexico State Penitentiary.

episodes.name: Starvation Heights
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve attempt to help a frightened teen who believes he's opened a gateway to evil at his home in Olalla, Washington.

episodes.name: Arctic Wrath
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate reports of dangerous paranormal activity at a hotel in the remote village of Central, Alaska.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two premieres with an astonishing examination of the Lizzie Borden House in Massachusetts. Highlights from the season include a historic home in Cartersville, Georgia, where the duo investigates a terrified mother's claims of strange paranormal activity and soon discover aggressive entities and evidence of a shocking murder. In Santaquin, Utah, the team explores disturbing paranormal reports at a family-owned restaurant, along with a residence in Elizabeth City, North Carolina housing a tragic past. Additional sites include the Slocum House Theater in Vancouver, Washington, where increasingly odd unexplained activity and ghostly apparitions have left its staff fearful for their safety, and a family home in Wichita, Kansas that is the center of a bone-chilling paranormal mystery dating back to the cowboy days of the 1800s.

episodes.name: Fatal Attachment
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate reports of ghostly apparitions at an office in Huntington, West Virginia.

episodes.name: A Banshee's Cry
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate reports of violent paranormal activity in upstate New York.

episodes.name: Revisited: Deadly Attraction and Fear at the Family Tree
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reveal new information about 2 previous investigations.

episodes.name: Revisited: Blood and Gold and Pandora's Box
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate an old Nevada mining town and a haunted family home in Georgia.

episodes.name: Revisited: A Widow's Rage and Death Sentence
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reveal new information since their visits to Alabama and New Mexico.

episodes.name: Revisited: Surrounded and Hotel Hell
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy uncover new details about a Texas homestead and a historic Florida hotel.

episodes.name: Revisited: Final Curtain Call and The Devil Made Me Do It
episodes.overview: New information is revealed about a community theater and a haunted restaurant.

episodes.name: Blood on the Tracks
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity at a newlywed’s home in Garrett, Indiana.

episodes.name: The Soul Collector
episodes.overview: Steve & Amy investigate frightening paranormal activity at a family home in West Virginia.

episodes.name: The House of Death
episodes.overview: Volunteers fear for their safety at a small arts center in Clinton, NC, where Steve and Amy discover paranormal entities that may cause the center to be shut down permanently.

episodes.name: Blood in the Bordello
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate claims of evil entities in Columbus, OH.

episodes.name: Family Curse
episodes.overview: Steve uncovers a history of bloodshed, while Amy faces-off against a demonic entity.

episodes.name: Deadly Gift
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate reports of paranormal activity in Wichita, KS.

episodes.name: Burned Alive
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy inspect alarming paranormal activity at a Seattle restaurant.

episodes.name: Tormented
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy examine paranormal activity at a family home in Colorado.

episodes.name: Never Alone
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate reports of paranormal activity in Forester, MI.

episodes.name: Forgotten
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity in Bloomington, IL.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In the third season, retired NYPD Homicide Detective Steve DiSchiavi and medium Amy Allan travels to a variety of locations including Huntington, West Virginia; Joliet, Illinois; Carmel, New York; Rome, Georgia; and Garrett, Indiana.

episodes.name: Betrayed
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a family in Southern New Jersey who believes their house is haunted by an evil entity. Through research, Steve says he discovers evidence that in the late 1800s, a nearby "health spa" that was really a sanatorium was run by an allegedly insane doctor named Dr. Smith who believed he found the fountain of youth. Steve also learns about a German immigrant, Louis Roesch who came to town in the 1860s and was betrayed by his people because there was no civilization here. Meanwhile, Amy says she encounters a monstrous shadowman in the basement who attempts to harm the living including herself. Also Amy claims to come into contact with the previous owner, Louis Brunk who died in the home and the two of the six children of the Roesch family.

episodes.name: The Beast
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a family who say they are getting sick in their family home and uncover what they feel is attacking their daughter with special needs. During the investigation, Steve uncovers past evidence of a fatal train disaster in 1907 caused by a flagman that occurred on the property which was the Rudd farm. The property history allegedly includes two men who threw dynamite inside a Black Methodist Church along with 4 men from the KKK who burned down the school next to it. Meanwhile, Amy says she confronts a beastly, dog-like apparition that she fears can kill anyone who gets in its way and an old man who was beating an 8-year-old boy named Elmer who once lived here.

episodes.name: Revisited: Fatal Attachment & Blood on the Tracks
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve share updates on their follow-up investigations when they revisit a dentist's office in rural Indiana that scared away patients and the staff. Next, they revisit a family home where a couple believes there is something demonic in their basement.

episodes.name: Deadly Grounds
episodes.overview: Amy confronts the powerful spirit of a religious woman at a family home in Wabash, IN, while Steve uncovers evidence that his client's property lies on Native American land with a violent past.

episodes.name: Evil Underground
episodes.overview: As Steve uncovers past secrets of a mobster that killed and buried his victims on the clients’ Illinois property, Amy encounters a powerful cluster of vicious entities with a murderous leader.

episodes.name: Revisited: The Soul Collector and Deadly Gift
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve revisit a West Virginia house where a mother and her eight children say they are being terrorized by hauntings in their home. Next, they return to a home in Wichita where a couple claim to be victimized by evil entities in their place of business at their beauty salon and auto body shop.

episodes.name: Possessed
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy head to Watervliet, MI, where frightening paranormal activity has transformed a family's dream home into a nightmare.

episodes.name: Spellbound
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy head to Virginia to investigate reports of paranormal activity. While Steve discovers the home was a former slave plantation, Amy confronts several spirits, including an entity she believes is planning to destroy the home.

episodes.name: Death Valley
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to California's Death Valley to investigate claims that frightening spirits have overrun a local hotel.

episodes.name: Bloodlust
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy head to Buffalo, WY, to investigate claims that the guests and employees of a historic hotel are being tormented by frightening paranormal activity.

episodes.name: Hotel Nowhere
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a hotel owner's suspicious claims of terrifying paranormal activity in Clovis, CA. As Steve uncovers evidence that the property was once a mental hospital, Amy encounters numerous vicious entities.

episodes.name: Revisited: Family Curse and The House of Death
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve revisit a home where a child-like demonic entity is said to change into an elemental that can possess the living. Next, they return to a Fine Arts Center that is inhabited by the ghosts of a gentleman farmer, a Confederate soldier and two Doctors, one that died in a freak snow storm and the other that slit his throat in the bath tub.

episodes.name: Violated
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate reports of abusive paranormal activity at a family home in Fort Wayne, IN. While Steve discovers a ruthless murder, Amy encounters an entity that she believes is torturing the living.

episodes.name: Battlefield
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a mother's claims of dangerous paranormal activity at her home in Flint, MI. As Steve finds out that the property was a bloody battleground during the War of 1812, Amy encounters numerous frightening entities.

episodes.name: Lethal Waters
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a shocking case of dangerous paranormal activity at the historic Riverside Inn in Cambridge Springs, PA. While Steve uncovers a deadly secret, Amy discovers the spirit of a woman who can control the living.

episodes.name: Tortured Souls
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate terrifying paranormal activity at a minister's home in Manchester, CT. While Steve unearths the property's history of violence, Amy confronts a menacing dark mass that targets the living.

episodes.name: Revisited: Forgotten and Burned Alive
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve revisit a home that is haunted by an axeman and an entity he controls called "The Doll", as well as numerous other entities believed to have previously lived on the land when it was a Poor Farm. The mother of the current family initially called The Dead Files team because her disabled son was being harassed by paranormal activity. Next, Amy and Steve return to what is apparently Seattle's oldest restaurant. A former saloon and brothel, one of the entities believed to be residing there is bar manager and former wrestler Otto Hink. The original building was a hotel that burned down during the Great Seattle Fire.

episodes.name: Revisited: Betrayed and A Banshee's Cry
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy disclose new information about prior cases of terrifying paranormal activity at a family home in Egg Harbor, NJ, and a restaurant in Carmel, NY.

episodes.name: Revisited: Evil Underground and Killed by the Klan
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy unveil new information about prior investigations of terrifying paranormal activity at homes in Rock Island, IL, and Key West, FL.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Season four begins in Egg Harbor City, NJ where one couple's home has turned from a cozy fixer-upper into a living hell. Additional locations include a house in Browns Summit, NC where haunted activity is adversely affecting one family's health; a childhood home in Wabash, IN that has taken on paranormal activity since it was rebuilt after a mysterious fire; the former home to a murderous mobster in Rock Island, IL that's ridden with unexplained shadows and noises; a Watervleit, MI home overcome with aggressive activity that terrorizes its inhabitants; a 19th century mansion in Buchanan, VA with dark secrets; and two haunted hotels - the Occidental Hotel in Buffalo, WY and The Amargosa Hotel & Opera House in Death Valley, CA, both of which are rapidly losing business due to terrified guests.

episodes.name: Plagued
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Flint, one of the most violent cities in the country to help a frightened mother in her haunted house.

episodes.name: Evil Within
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal claims at a haunted hotel called the Riverside Inn where the activity has gotten so bad that the owner says her employees and guests are scared to work and stay there.

episodes.name: Revisited: Battlefield & Violated
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy disclose new information about previous investigations of paranormal activity at family homes in Flint, MI, and Fort Wayne, IN, featuring shocking, never-before-seen footage of a violent exorcism.

episodes.name: Forever Scarred
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy Allan investigate a Chicago home where a young mother seems to be suffering from horrifying recurring nightmares.

episodes.name: The Axe Murder House
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate startling new claims of paranormal activity at an infamous murder site in Villisca, IA. But after violent unexplained encounters at the property, Steve and Amy’s client worries that living next door to the notorious Ax Murder House may have put his family in danger.

episodes.name: Dead End
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate terrifying paranormal activity at a police officer's home in Neosho, MO. As Steve uncovers evidence of a brutal homicide, Amy faces her own fears when she encounters a powerful shadow person with deadly plans for the living.

episodes.name: The Devil's Bidding
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Williamsport, PA, to investigate a home tormented by a devil. As Steve discovers the property was once the site of a historic massacre, Amy faces off against an evil entity that she fears has been ruining lives for generations.

episodes.name: Summoning Souls
episodes.overview: In Starks, ME, Steve unearths a property’s dark past when he discovers that the nearby land was once a desecrated cemetery. Meanwhile, Amy confronts several terrifying spirits, including a legion of the dead, determined to destroy the lives of unsuspecting victims.

episodes.name: Invaded
episodes.overview: A disturbed entity overwhelms Amy as she and Steve investigate violent paranormal activity at a family owned restaurant in Waxahachie, TX.

episodes.name: House of Horrors
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve travel to Radford, VA, to investigate frightening paranormal activity at the eerie St. Albans Sanatorium. Steve’s fact-finding mission reveals the hospital’s horrific past, while Amy encounters numerous powerful spirits, including a dangerous entity with the power to possess the living.

episodes.name: Ghosts of Deadwood
episodes.overview: When violent paranormal activity plagues the owner and staff of the historic Fairmont Hotel and Casino in legendary Deadwood, SD, Steve and Amy step in to investigate.

episodes.name: Master of the Damned
episodes.overview: While investigating a family home in Potsdam, NY, Steve discovers evidence of a bar fight so brutal that it left a man dead in the street, while Amy faces off against a dominant entity that commands other dead people to terrorize the living.

episodes.name: Innocent Blood
episodes.overview: When terrifying paranormal activity targets the children of a Rome, NY, family, Steve and Amy step in to investigate. As Steve discovers the property’s distressing connection to a bloody Revolutionary War ambush, Amy encounters a vicious entity that preys on living children.

episodes.name: Dark Inheritance
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a frightened family's claims of violent paranormal encounters inside their home in Winthrop, MA. While Steve discovers the property’s violent past, Amy confronts a vengeful, disfigured entity that wreaks havoc on the living.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The fifth season opens with an investigation of Iowa's Villisca Axe Murder House - site of a gruesome century-old mass murder whose case still remains unsolved. Other highlights include a Chicago home where a woman has returned to confront childhood nightmares; violent forces terrorizing a family home in St. Clair Shores, MI, that leaves the team questioning the safety of the house; a special "Dead Files Revisited" episode in which a violent exorcism was recorded in a Flint, MI home after the duo uncovered malicious entities; and more.

episodes.name: Revisited: Deadly Grounds and Blood in the Bordello
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy disclose new information about prior investigations of horrifying paranormal activity at a family home in Wabash, IN, and a bar in Columbus, OH.

episodes.name: The Aftermath
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy step in to investigate disturbing paranormal activity at a frightened family's home in hurricane-ravaged Florida City, FL.

episodes.name: Fractured
episodes.overview: When a terrified woman from St. Louis claims that something paranormal pushed her down the stairs, Steve and Amy step in to investigate.

episodes.name: Assaulted
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate unexplained violent attacks at a terrified woman's home in Hanover, PA.

episodes.name: Demon War
episodes.overview: During their separate and harrowing investigations, Steve researches the corrupt, troubled history of a previous homeowner's life, while Amy's late-night walk through a family home in Toledo, OH, brings her face to face with multiple opposing entities.

episodes.name: Satan's Revenge
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Leslie, MI, to investigate reports of extreme paranormal activity at a desperate family's home. Steve researches the history of the property, while Amy confronts several powerful entities, including a dead man with hopes of inflicting gruesome physical injuries.

episodes.name: The Dark One
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate disturbing reports of vicious paranormal activity at an Air Force veteran's home in Abilene, TX. As Steve unearths the property's disastrous history, Amy confronts a fierce shadow creature.

episodes.name: Double Jeopardy
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate reports of terrifying paranormal activity at a family-owned hotel in Santa Paula, CA. While Steve unearths the property's dreadful history as the site of a cold-blooded murder, Amy encounters a sinister shadow figure that finds pleasure from killing women.

episodes.name: Feeding Grounds
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate terrifying reports of hostile paranormal activity at an Oregon bed and breakfast. Steve exposes the property's awful past, while Amy confronts an enraged male entity, and a group of desolate dead women who drain the life force of the living.

episodes.name: The Cursed Path
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a Roseburg, OR, woman's claims of violent paranormal activity. While Steve uncovers the turbulent past of the property, Amy confronts numerous powerful entities and discovers unseen pathways that could possibly lead to other dimensions.

episodes.name: Bound
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Ft. Barnwell, NC, to investigate reports of disturbing paranormal activity at a terrified family's home. Steve unearths the bloody history of the property, while Amy confronts multiple entities with mysterious intentions, including a cluster of dead women trapped together in the afterlife.

episodes.name: Living Nightmare
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Flint, MI, when a frightened family claims something paranormal is attacking them in their sleep. Steve researches the dark history of the former landowners, while Amy confronts multiple entities inside and outside the home.

episodes.name: Eternal Hatred
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a home in Chester Springs, PA, where a 100-year-old murder may be related to frightening paranormal experiences. While Steve digs into the property's past, Amy confronts a demon lurking in the barn.

episodes.name: Intolerance
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate terrifying claims of paranormal activity at a local hotel in Warsaw, IN. While Steve uncovers a grizzly double murder that took place on the same land in the late 1800s, Amy encounters multiple entities, including a dead woman who was the lone survivor of a brutal attack against her family.

episodes.name: Revisited: Never Alone and Spellbound
episodes.overview: With shocking, never-before-seen footage, Steve and Amy reveal new information about previous investigations in Forester, MI, and Buchanan, VA.

episodes.name: Revisited: Tortured Souls and Evil Within
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy disclose new information about previous investigations of horrifying paranormal activity at a minister's home in Connecticut and a family home in Michigan.

episodes.name: Revisited: Plagued and Lethal Waters
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy disclose new information about previous investigations at a desperate veteran’s home in Cressona and a haunted riverfront hotel in another Pennsylvania town, Cambridge Springs.

episodes.name: Revisited: Dead End and Summoning Souls
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and psychic medium Amy Allan disclose new information about previous investigations of terrifying paranormal activity in Neosho, Missouri and Starks, Maine.

episodes.name: Revisited: Forever Scarred and Invaded
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and  Amy Allan disclose new information about previous paranormal investigations in Chicago, IL and Waxahachie, TX.

episodes.name: Revisited: Master of the Damned and Ghosts of Deadwood
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reveal new information about their previous investigations of paranormal activity at a retired police detective's home in Potsdam, New York and the historic Fairmont Hotel and Casino in Deadwood, South Dakota.

episodes.name: Revisited: Innocent Blood and Fractured
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reveal new information about their previous investigations of dangerous paranormal activity in Rome, New York, and St. Louis, Missouri, including the desperate efforts to remove the menacing entities that prey on the living.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: From the Pacific Northwest to the Florida everglades, DiSchiavi and Allan are on a mission to help solve each case and restore peace to their distressed clients - whether it's an entire family living in terror, a besieged business or an unexplained violent attack. In the season six premiere, Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Florida City, Fla. to help a frightened family terrorized by disturbing paranormal activity. Upcoming investigations take place in Abilene, Texas; Chester Springs, Pa; Flint, Mich.; Ft. Barnwell, N.C.; Hanover, Pa.; Leslie, Mich.; Roseburg, Ore.; Santa Paula, Calif; St. Louis, Mo.; Sumpter, Ore.; Toledo, Ohio; and Warsaw, Ind.

episodes.name: Guardians of the Dead
episodes.overview: In their first international investigation, Steve and Amy travel to Montego Bay, Jamaica, to investigate a deadly legend and frightening claims of paranormal activity at a tropical resort.

episodes.name: Deranged
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Falconer, NY, to investigate reports of violent paranormal activity at a frightened family's home. While Steve interviews family members and gathers information, Amy’s nighttime walk becomes painfully dangerous.

episodes.name: House of Mirrors
episodes.overview: When a desperate couple fears for their grandson's safety, Steve and Amy are called to Independence, OR, to investigate. While Steve discovers multiple tragedies surrounding the property, Amy encounters spirits capable of changing their appearance.

episodes.name: The Instigator
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a home in Pittsburgh where a terrified family is being tormented by a dangerous entity. While Steve discovers the heartache of 2 of the property's previous owners, Amy encounters several conflicting entities.

episodes.name: The Obsession
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate disturbing claims that victims of a gruesome murder haunt an Oregon, IL, restaurant. Steve encounters resistance from employees as he questions them about the startling activity, while Amy confronts several distraught entities.

episodes.name: From Beyond
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate claims of dangerous paranormal activity at a suburban Georgia home built on a blood-soaked Civil War battleground. During their separate investigations, Steve learns about the house’s past, while Amy sees and hears multiple ominous spirits.

episodes.name: Afflicted
episodes.overview: When demonic forces devastate a terrified family in Covington, LA, Steve and Amy step in to investigate. While Steve researches the life of the original property owner, Amy encounters several demons, including one that can attach itself to the living.

episodes.name: Torn Apart
episodes.overview: A terrified mother calls on Steve and Amy to investigate claims of vicious paranormal activity at her family’s home in Struthers, OH. As Steve examines the history of the property, Amy confronts multiple mutilated entities during her late-night walk.

episodes.name: Perfect Storm
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a poltergeist at a frightened family's home in Delaware, OH. During their separate yet equally intense investigations, Steve uncovers one of the most bizarre deaths he’s ever seen, while Amy runs into many dark entities, including a sociopathic woman.

episodes.name: The Creeper
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate the connection between a Texas woman's terrifying claims of paranormal activity and a cold-blooded murder. While Steve delves into the property's history, Amy interacts with a dead man who physically agitates the living. She also sees dozens of mummified spirits roaming the property.

episodes.name: Madhouse
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate claims of disturbing paranormal activity at a historic movie theater in Marshall, MO. While Amy is overwhelmed by the presence of an extreme number of dead people, Steve discovers several deaths associated with the property.

episodes.name: Vengeance
episodes.overview: When violent paranormal activity threatens a family-owned restaurant in Albuquerque, Steve and Amy step in to investigate. Steve finds disturbing evidence that five people died on the property and that a local lawman with blood on his hands was hanged nearby, while Amy clashes with several dead people, including a murderer and the victim of a deadly assault.

episodes.name: Smothered
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate horrifying claims of paranormal activity targeting children at a family home in Delmont, PA. While Steve researches a neighborhood predator who’s guilty of several crimes throughout the area, Amy interacts with a number of disturbing entities, including a dead woman who loathes children.

episodes.name: Revisited: Demon War and Assaulted
episodes.overview: Featuring never-before-seen footage, Steve and Amy give new information about shocking investigations at homes in Toledo, Ohio and Hanover, Pennsylvania.

episodes.name: Revisited: Satan's Revenge and Double Jeopardy
episodes.overview: With new interviews and exclusive never-before-seen footage, Steve and Amy follow-up on their shocking investigations at a home in Leslie, Michigan and a historic hotel in Santa Paula, California.

episodes.name: Revisited: Feeding Grounds and The Aftermath
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reopen investigations of frightening paranormal activity at a B&B in Oregon and a terrified family's home in Florida, where one of the Dead Files producers has a disturbing experience.

episodes.name: Revisited: Eternal Hatred and Intolerance
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reveal new details about cases in Pennsylvania and Indiana.

episodes.name: Revisited: The Dark One and Deranged
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reveal new details about cases in Texas and New York.

episodes.name: Revisited: House of Mirrors and The Obsession
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reopen investigations of dangerous paranormal activity at a frightened couple's home in Independence, Oregon, and a local restaurant with a dark past in Oregon, Illinois.

episodes.name: Revisited: Afflicted and Torn Apart
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy update terrifying investigations of alarming paranormal activity at the homes of a distraught mother in Covington, Louisiana, and a conflicted family in Struthers, Ohio.

episodes.name: Revisited: The Creeper and Madhouse
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy reopen two of their most shocking cases at a newlywed couple's home in Coupland, Texas, and a historic movie theater in Marshall, Missouri.

episodes.name: Revisited: Ghosts of Deadwood and Smothered
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy re-open a previous case of paranormal activity for a second time by returning to a historic hotel in Deadwood, South Dakota, as well as revisiting a traumatized family's home in Delmont, Pennsylvania.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: Featured locations in the seventh season includes Montego Bay, Jamaica; Falconer, N.Y.; Independence, Ore.; Macon, Ga.; Oregon, Ill.; Covington, La.; Struthers, Ohio; Delaware, Ohio; Coupland, Texas; Marshall, Mo.; Albuquerque, N.M.; Delmont, Penn.

episodes.name: Toys for the Dead
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate violent paranormal activity at an historic brothel in Butte, Montana.

episodes.name: Evil Influence
episodes.overview: Retired NYPD homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and physical medium Amy Allan investigate threatening paranormal activity at a frightened family's home in Mayfield, Kentucky.

episodes.name: No Vacancy
episodes.overview: Retired NYPD homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and physical medium Amy Allan investigate paranormal activity at a small-town hotel in Grass Valley, California.

episodes.name: Gateway to Hell
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate terrifying claims of disturbing paranormal activity at a distraught mother's home in Lake Jackson, Texas.

episodes.name: The Darkening
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate frightening reports of violent paranormal activity in a Wisconsin townhome. During her walk, Amy encounters a terrifying, unstable dead man and a malicious old woman who can influence the thoughts of the living.

episodes.name: Bent on Revenge
episodes.overview: Retired NYPD homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and physical medium Amy Allan investigate terrifying paranormal activity at family home in Sicily Island, Louisiana.

episodes.name: Contempt
episodes.overview: Retired NYPD homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and physical medium Amy Allan investigate disturbing claims of hateful paranormal activity in a family home in North Haven, Connecticut.

episodes.name: You Will Be Mine
episodes.overview: Retired NYPD homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and physical medium Amy Allan investigate violent paranormal activity at a family home in North Beach, Maryland.

episodes.name: Return to Evil
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate the history of paranormal activity at a home in Patricksburg, IN. Steve discovers that a violent vigilante group was linked to the property, while Amy encounters a demon manipulating a dead girl.

episodes.name: Devil's Plaything
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan head to a Canton, IL, home where a young boy's paranormal encounters reveal a dangerous power. Steve digs up proof of a horrific unsolved murder, while Amy faces a threatening entity who preys on the weak.

episodes.name: Crowded House
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate activity that threatens to destroy a family in Richmond Heights, Ohio. Steve discovers past tragedies on the property, while Amy interacts with a spirit who keeps reliving his own death.

episodes.name: The Whispering
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a woman's claims that the activity in her Concrete, WA, home will kill her. Steve unearths the genocide of a local Indian tribe, while Amy encounters a powerful energy barrier constructed by the dead.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity at a historic Hawaiian plantation. Steve discovers the property's dark past and fallout after the attack on Pearl Harbor, while Amy copes with an attack from an aggressive spirit.

episodes.name: The Sacrifice
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate distressing paranormal activity at a home in East Flat Rock, North Carolina. Steve uncovers evidence of a grisly ritualistic murder, while Amy crosses paths with several dangerous entities capable of possessing vulnerable people.

episodes.name: The Predator
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate dangerously disturbing activity at a home in Gates, North Carolina. During their harrowing investigation, Steve witnesses a shocking paranormal attack involving the client's daughter and vows to find answers.

episodes.name: Controlled
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a family's home in Estill Springs, Tennessee, where the husband may be under the control of the paranormal. Steve uncovers the property's connection to a heinous hate crime, while Amy fends off attacks from a violent entity.

episodes.name: Compelled
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity affecting the emotions of a mother and daughter in St. Charles, Michigan. Steve uncovers the town's history of deadly mine accidents, while Amy encounters spirits capable of projecting shame and fear on the living.

episodes.name: Consumed
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a terminally ill woman's claims that aggressive paranormal activity is ripping her family apart. Steve uncovers a connection to a gruesome mob hit, while Amy confronts a powerful negative energy that can manipulate the living.

episodes.name: Deadly Relations
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate claims of paranormal activity at a home in Lake City, Florida. Steve discovers the client's mother was killed inside the home, and Amy encounters an entity that can manipulate and influence the living to commit violent acts.

episodes.name: The Watcher
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan investigate paranormal activity threatening a bar in Paso Robles, California. During their investigations, Steve finds evidence of a vigilante group helmed by a former landowner, while Amy interacts with entities capable of causing physical harm to the living.

episodes.name: Fear Lives Here
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a dangerous poltergeist terrorizing a family in Magna, Utah. Steve digs into the town's mining history, while Amy encounters a dangerous manifestation formed by multiple people living inside the home.

episodes.name: Legion of Death
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan investigate paranormal activity overwhelming a family in rural Spartanburg, South Carolina. In their separate investigations, Steve learns of a ruthless Revolutionary War soldier who is credited with over fifty deaths, including a former property owner, while Amy is overcome by negative energy at every turn as she endures one of her most active walks to date.

episodes.name: It Feeds
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan investigate a dangerous poltergeist attacking an entire family in Santa Rosa Beach, Florida. Steve investigates the home's dark past to discover an historic graveyard on the property as well as evidence that a Civil War veteran who suffered his fair share of tragedies and hardships lived there. Meanwhile, Amy encounters a powerfully vicious entity that torments every member of the family in a variety of disturbing ways.

episodes.name: Feeding the Fire
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Kaufman, Texas, to help a family being torn apart by negative paranormal activity. While Steve investigates the original property owner's fall from grace as well as a brutal unsolved murder, Amy confronts several entities, including a dead female influencing the living through dreams and a mysterious negative energy that has the entire family turning on each other.

episodes.name: Drawn to Evil
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity at a historic estate in Medina, New York. During their unnerving investigation, Steve tracks down local experts who uncover one of the most gruesome murders in the town's history, while Amy is jumped by a female entity and is overwhelmed by one of her darkest discoveries to date.

episodes.name: The Offering
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate claims of terrifying paranormal activity at a Sedona, Arizona, restaurant. During their intense investigation, Steve examines an unsolved murder case as well as the devastating fate of the local Native Americans, while Amy encounters frightening, unpredictable entities at every turn during her nighttime walk through the property.

episodes.name: Hell in the Heartland
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan investigate violent paranormal activity at a family home in the small town of Kearney, Missouri. During their separate investigations, Steve tracks down the history of a ruthless Civil War-era gang leader, while Amy encounters several deceased individuals, including a trapped male spirit and a dead woman capable of physically assaulting the living.

episodes.name: Night Terrors
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Brumley, Missouri, to investigate paranormal disturbances keeping customers awake at an historic bed and breakfast. While Steve's investigation reveals a surprising past involving medicine and religion, including a horrific murder-suicide, Amy encounters several translucent entities, one of which is stalking the living from within the building's walls.

episodes.name: Deadly Promise
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Chicago to investigate paranormal activity terrorizing the employees and customers at funeral home turned tattoo parlor. While Steve's investigation reveals a shocking past involving the mysterious death of the original owner's wife, Amy encounters two dangerous entities who like watching, and sometimes interacting, with the living.

episodes.name: A Widow's Revenge
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Dumfries, VA, to investigate activity that's tormenting volunteers and visitors at a historic museum. During the investigation, Amy encounters a female spirit wishing to harm the living.

episodes.name: Skin Walker - Hardinsburg, Indiana
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Hardinsburg, Indiana, to investigate claims of vicious paranormal activity affecting a family who fear for the safety of their sick father. While Steve's investigation reveals a fanatical preacher who led an armed revolt against his own church, Amy encounters a twisted entity whose mission is to trap the souls of the deceased.

episodes.name: Return of the Damned
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Evans, Georgia, to investigate a shattered family's claim that paranormal activity led to the premature death of their 41-year-old son. While Steve's investigation of the property reveals a shocking past filled with slavery and murder, Amy encounters a dead child who's capable of inflicting physical pain on the living.

episodes.name: While the Children Sleep
episodes.overview: A frightened mother calls on Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan to investigate claims of malicious paranormal activity directed at her children and elderly mother in Olympia, Washington. While Steve's investigation reveals a deadly explosion that killed nearly a dozen people, Amy encounters a hateful murder victim hell-bent on ending the existence of anyone in her path.

episodes.name: The Devil Inside
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy investigate paranormal activity threatening the lives of a cancer survivor, her two children and her older sister in Applegate, California. While Steve's investigation reveals an execution-style killing connected to a cult near the property, Amy encounters demonic gargoyles that prey on the living.

episodes.name: Deadly Kin
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Louisville, Kentucky, to investigate paranormal violence threatening the lives of a grieving elderly woman and her daughter. During her walk, Amy encounters the spirit of an angry man with a deadly mission.

episodes.name: Lust to Kill
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Victor, New York, to investigate paranormal activity terrifying two Army veterans who fear whatever is happening inside their home could kill them and their family. While Steve's investigation uncovers a double homicide with ties to the property, Amy encounters a serial-killing widow who's targeted the family as her next victims.

episodes.name: Influence to Kill
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Layton, UT, where a grandfather fears for the life and safety of his grandson. Their investigation uncovers a psychotic dead man attempting to possess the grandson as well as a portal inside his bedroom that allows shadow people to infest the house.

episodes.name: Drained
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan investigate paranormal activity threatening the lives of a Ripley, WV, father and his family.  Their investigation uncovers a powerful demon terrorizing the family, along with a psychic vampire who threatens to suck the life force from everyone who lives in the house.

episodes.name: Shattered
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Sinclairville, NY, where a mother of two believes paranormal activity is responsible for the disintegration of her marriage and physical attacks on her children. Their investigation uncovers a mysterious entity that is causing the dead to lash out at the living.

episodes.name: Triggered
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity harassing a young family in Flint, MI. While Steve's investigation of the property exposes a family man with a murderous past, Amy confronts a sinister entity that preys on the vulnerable.

episodes.name: Deadly Reflections
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Waxahachie, Texas, to investigate a widow’s claim that the paranormal killed her husband and is targeting her daughter. During her walk, Amy finds an evil mass and mirrors acting as a pathway for the dead.

episodes.name: Killer Instinct
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity harassing a young couple and their children in El Cajon, CA. While Steve discovers the unsettling details of an infamous serial killer in the area, Amy goes toe-to-toe with a vengeful spirit.

episodes.name: Jumped
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity at a historic hotel where the dead take pleasure in tormenting both employees and guests. During the daunting investigation, Amy confronts a dark presence vying for control of her physical being.

episodes.name: Desert Curse
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate investigate paranormal activity terrorizing an elderly Arizona couple. While Steve’s investigation reveals the property’s bloody history, Amy uncovers an entity hellbent on trapping the souls of the living.

episodes.name: The Uninvited
episodes.overview: In Kentucky, Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity tormenting a recently separated woman and her two children; Amy's late-night walk leads her to an inter-dimensional portal filled with malicious aliens.

episodes.name: Lullaby for the Dead
episodes.overview: In Briceville, Tenn., Steve and Amy investigate a case involving a woman who fears for the safety of her children as vengeful spirits torment them; during her late-night walk, Amy discovers a vindictive spirit with a hatred for children.

episodes.name: Evil Descends
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to a home in Murrieta, California, where a mother worries that her husband's dealings in witchcraft have led to the paranormal activity that's tearing her family apart.

episodes.name: Inviting Evil
episodes.overview: In Berthoud, Colo., a woman calls on Steve and Amy to investigate claims of vicious paranormal activity at her home; during her after-hours walk on the property, Amy encounters a demon set on tormenting the living and a malevolent shadow person.

episodes.name: Innocence Lost
episodes.overview: Where a mother worries that her husband’s dealings in witchcraft have led to the paranormal activity that’s tearing her family apart.

episodes.name: Dark Thoughts
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Waterford, Conn., to investigate a recently separated woman's claims that her family is under attack by a paranormal entity; Amy discovers that the key to what's haunting the living may not necessarily reside with the dead.

episodes.name: Terrorland
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate an abandoned amusement park in Lake Shawnee, WV. While Steve uncovers Native American attacks and multiple drownings, Amy uncovers a vengeful group of dead that will stop at nothing to get its land back.

episodes.name: Easy Prey
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Grant Township, MI, where a desperate couple claims paranormal activity is trying to kill them. During the disturbing investigation, Amy encounters a malicious dead man and an entity capable of physically harming the living.

episodes.name: Taken
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate claims that a family of six is being destroyed by paranormal activity. During her walk, Amy encounters a woman hellbent on attacking everyone in the house and a group of demonic entities capable of possessing the living.

episodes.name: Tangled
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate vicious supernatural activity tormenting a mother and her two daughters. During her late night walk, Amy encounters a menacing dead woman who physically assaults the living and an insidious vine-like entity.

episodes.name: Deadly Intentions
episodes.overview: In New Franken, Wis., Steve and Amy investigate violent activity that's ruining a woman's hopes of opening her dream business; Steve learns about two tragedies in the area; Amy encounters an army of shadow people intent on death and destruction.

episodes.name: A Thousand Pieces
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate a Louisiana woman’s claims that a vicious supernatural entity killed her father and is wreaking havoc on her family. During her walk, Amy encounters a vindictive dead man and a powerful entity that consumes personalities.

episodes.name: The Bethlehem Haunting
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate violent paranormal activity terrorizing a vulnerable mother and her young child. During her late night walk, Amy encounters several entities, including a dead man who is hell-bent on possessing and tormenting the living.

episodes.name: The Lady in Black
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate unusual activity tormenting a husband-and-wife team of paranormal investigators. During her unsettling late-night walk, Amy encounters the spirit of a malicious dead woman set on taking the life of the innocent.

episodes.name: The Cult
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Chatsworth, Calif., to help a woman who believes her house is trying to kill her; Steve uncovers a connection to an infamous cult leader, while Amy discovers demons that torment the living.

episodes.name: Collision Course
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Ohio to help a terrified couple save their business, son and marriage from violent paranormal activity. During her unsettling walk, Amy discovers two groups of warring dead people who torment each other and the living.

episodes.name: Cursed
episodes.overview: In Pinellas Park, Fla., Steve and Amy investigate a mother's claims about violent paranormal activity; while Steve learns about two deaths associated with the house, Amy suspects a person of dabbling in witchcraft to lure dark entities to the home.

episodes.name: Dead Rising
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Alabama to help a family being torn apart by menacing entities hellbent on destroying their home and business. During her walk, Amy encounters a vicious group of dead men and a powerful shadow man who torments the living.

episodes.name: 'Til Death
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Nebraska to help a woman who believes paranormal activity has taken control of her husband; during her walk, Amy encounters a mischievous trickster whose pranks are becoming more and more vicious.

episodes.name: Killing Fields
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy help an Ohio man who believes something on his property threatens his mother; Amy discovers the land suffers under a curse that hinders the lives of the living and encounters a bitter dead man using the curse to his advantage.

episodes.name: Damaged
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Kentucky investigate a woman's claims that something in her house attacked her kids and changed her husband's personality; during her walk, Amy discovers a dead cowboy who can cause the living to die of sudden illnesses.

episodes.name: Darkness Rises
episodes.overview: DiSchiavi and Allan investigate a frightened woman's claims that decades of paranormal activity in her Tonawanda, New York, home has now become dangerously violent. During their separate investigations, DiSchiavi uncovers the story of a twisted teenager who poisoned several children, while Allan's walk reveals a dark entity focused on tormenting the living.

episodes.name: Demon Seed
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Gatesville, Texas, where a couple is being tormented by demonic entities hellbent on destroying their home and their grandchildren. During their separate investigations, DiSchiavi uncovers the dark and sordid history of a boys' reformatory turned female prison, while Allan encounters a vicious serpent-like entity that is set on contaminating the souls of all who inhabit the property.

episodes.name: The Watchers
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Blue Springs, Missouri, where a mother fears for the safety of her children as unseen forces torment them on a daily basis. During their separate investigations, DiSchiavi discovers the property was the scene of a gruesome murder-suicide in the 1960s, while Allan encounters the spirit of a dead man who has a deep resentment towards women and children.

episodes.name: Not My Child
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi and Amy Allan travel to Jefferson City, Missouri, where a family has had to abandon their new home in order to escape the intense paranormal activity inside of it. Even worse, they're worried their young daughter has been possessed by one of the dark entities tormenting them.

episodes.name: Lost Souls
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to New London, WI, where a family is on the brink of destruction due to powerful paranormal activity. The parents fear one of their children may have summoned a demonic entity through a spirit board.

episodes.name: Evil Comes Home
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Colorado to aid a team of investigators who fear they brought violent activity home from one of their investigations. Both women have reached a boiling point and need answers before things turn deadly.

episodes.name: Deadly Vessel
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate violent paranormal activity at a New Orleans restaurant. The owners fear that if the activity gets any worse it's only a matter of time before one of their employees, or guests, are seriously hurt.

episodes.name: Going Rogue
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Springfield, OH, where a woman is losing control of her temper and personality. Her family fears she may be possessed, and she's worried something in the house is trying to kill her.

episodes.name: Devil's Triangle
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Pittsburgh to investigate paranormal activity in a tattoo parlor where the artists and customers fear for their safety.

episodes.name: The Blurry Man
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve head to Highland Park, Illinois, where a panic-stricken family claims life in their new home has been been hell on Earth. The parents fear if Amy and Steve can't help, their kids could get seriously hurt.

episodes.name: Rage
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve travel to Lynchburg, Ohio, to investigate a shadowy figure.

episodes.name: Absorbed
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy head to a horse farm in Hartford, Wisconsin, where a family is threatened by dark forces. Steve uncovers a history of religious mania and insanity, while Amy encounters a shadow person preying on the living.

episodes.name: Deadly Force
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy head down to the Florida Everglades to meet with a Reiki master who claims her family is being torn apart by violent paranormal attacks. She's worried if Steve and Amy can't help, someone is going to wind up hurt -- or even dead.

episodes.name: Driven to Kill
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Toledo, Ohio, where a family faces a daily onslaught of aggressive paranormal activity. Steve uncovers a grisly string of murders committed near the property, while Amy encounters a twisted spirit intent on harming the living.

episodes.name: Town of the Dead
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Upper Darby, Pennsylvania, where a single mother claims the dead are attacking her three children. The activity is getting more dangerous by the day, and she's worried if it can't be stopped someone is going to die.

episodes.name: The Gateway
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Wakefield, Massachusetts, where a young mother fears a gateway to the afterlife has brought unwanted guests into her grandmother's home. With the activity getting worse by the day, it's only a matter of time before someone is hurt.

episodes.name: Puppet Master
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Indianapolis, where a couple claims dark forces are wreaking havoc on their lives. They fear the house intends to kill them to prevent them from providing a safe and loving home to their two young granddaughters.

episodes.name: Dark Soul
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy are called to Pataskala, Ohio, to investigate claims of paranormal activity terrorizing a grandmother and her family. All hell has broken loose inside the home, and everyone believes they are in serious danger.

episodes.name: Last Call
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Palatka, Florida, to investigate violent paranormal activity at a downtown bar. The owners claim all hell broke loose when they began renovations, and they fear the family business is cursed.

episodes.name: Detox
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Elizabeth City, North Carolina, where a woman claims paranormal activity has spiked ever since she got sober. She fears if the evil spirits lurking inside her home can't be stopped, she will fall down a dark path of no return.

episodes.name: Entangled
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Newton, Pennsylvania, where a family claims a recent home renovation has unleashed an onslaught of paranormal activity. Everyone in the home is under attack, and they're worried they won't survive living there for much longer.

episodes.name: Never Human
episodes.overview: Amy and Steve head to New Philadelphia, Ohio, where dark forces are causing a rift in a couple's marriage. Even worse, the newlyweds are under constant physical attack. They fear someone will wind up dead if they can't rid their home of the evil spirits.

episodes.name: Deadly Intruder
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Watertown, Wisconsin, where a woman claims a dark entity is threatening her once-idyllic marriage. She is convinced the spirit will kill them both if it can't be stopped.

episodes.name: The Visitors
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Coleraine, Minnesota, where paranormal activity threatens to tear a family apart. Everyone is under attack, mysterious shadow figures are not what they seem and the family is worried they won't survive without their help.

episodes.name: The Craving
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Tucson, Arizona, where ancient supernatural forces are tormenting a retired cop and his family. Everyone in the home is under attack, and the family fears their nine-year-old may be possessed by something evil.

episodes.name: Damned in the Desert
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy travel to Marana, Arizona, where dark supernatural forces threaten to destroy a New Age couple's sanity and health. They fear if something isn't done soon their marriage won't last -- and neither will their time on this earth.

episodes.name: Evil in the Everglades
episodes.overview: Trouble in paradise. A Florida woman says the activity in her house turned violent the moment her mom died. Steve and Amy are on the case.

episodes.name: Sudden Fury
episodes.overview: A Florida mom is convinced the dead are trying to kill off her family one by one. Steve and Amy are on the case.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: Steve and Amy investigate an Alabama new age store, where customers and employees are being targeted by the paranormal.

episodes.name: Head Games
episodes.overview: A Florida woman is convinced the paranormal influenced her parents to commit suicide, and now they're going after the rest of her family. Steve and Amy investigate.

episodes.name: Killer Smile
episodes.overview: A South Carolina woman believes the house she saved up for her entire life- is trying to kill her. Amy and Steve are on the case.

episodes.name: Shadows of Death
episodes.overview: Steve DiSchiavi works his first case with his new partner, Cindy Kaza. The two head to Tucson, where a woman is desperately trying to convince her husband to move out of their haunted house.

episodes.name: The Butcher
episodes.overview: Steve and Cindy help a professional romance writer, who says her home has turned into a real-life horror story.

episodes.name: Chaos in the Canyon
episodes.overview: A California family gets more than they bargained for, when they call Steve and Cindy in to investigate their haunted dream home.

episodes.name: Nowhere to Hide
episodes.overview: A professional paranormal investigator believes he got in over his head and placed his entire family in danger. Desperate for help, he's reached out to Steve and Cindy to save him.

episodes.name: Imprisoned
episodes.overview: An Arizona couple spent years saving up for their own home but the second they moved in, they realized it was haunted. Steve and Cindy are on the case.

episodes.name: Burning Hatred
episodes.overview: An Indiana woman is worried sick for her parents, who she believes are in denial about living in a haunted home. She says they are in serious danger, and she hopes Steve and Cindy can convince them to leave.

episodes.name: Isolated
episodes.overview: Steve and Cindy face one of the biggest professional challenges of their careers trying to help a father and daughter trapped in a paranormal war zone in rural Tennessee.

episodes.name: The Eternal Haunting
episodes.overview: The people who run a civil war museum in Kentucky say it's so dangerous, they're thinking of shutting the place down. They're praying Steve and Cindy can save this important piece of American history.
